name: Solar Snoop's Star Trek
description:
Endless Space Flyer Adventure!

Collect *Power Stars*  and avoid or shoot the obstacles in your path!    
    
Traveling, shooting & taking damage all use precious power - survive for as long as possible.    
    
Created by Zamboni Macaroni: [zambo.fun](https://www.zambo.fun/)!    
Follow us on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ZamboniMacaroni)!    
Like us on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/zambonimacaroni)!    
    
Credits:

Feedback welcome, updates to come!
